data.lyric:
[ti:Like A Lady]
[ar:Lady A]
[al:Women Of Big Machine]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Like A Lady - Lady A (战前女神)
[00:00.19]Lyrics by：Martin Johnson/Brandon Paddock/Hillary Scott/Dave Barnes/Michelle Buzz
[00:00.39]Composed by：Martin Johnson/Brandon Paddock/Hillary Scott/Dave Barnes/Michelle Buzz
[00:00.58]Lady
[00:08.23]Lady
[00:13.43]I'm not the kinda girl to go and fight for all your attention
[00:19.99]Mmm mmm
[00:23.06]I'm not too afraid to call this off and go see what I've been missing
[00:29.93]Mmm mmm
[00:32.81]Leave the dress at home 'cause it makes me too polite
[00:37.45]No more waiting by the phone I'm stepping out tonight
[00:41.73]'Cause I feel like a lady
[00:45.60]Sippin' on tequila with my Levi's on
[00:48.00]A lady
[00:50.56]Singin' to the music playin' all night long
[00:52.93]Yeah I'm feeling right I'm living my life I do what I like
[00:56.84]'Cause I feel like a lady a lady
[01:03.29]Treat myself to what's up on the highest shelf
[01:06.84]I want it I get it
[01:10.16]Mmm mmm
[01:13.16]I might look like I'm lonely but I'm only loving every minute
[01:20.18]Ooh baby
[01:23.13]Leave the heels at home 'cause they never do me right
[01:27.59]Go out dancing on my own
[01:30.02]Man these heels don't lie
[01:32.21]'Cause I feel like a lady
[01:35.75]Sippin' on tequila with my Levi's on
[01:38.06]A lady
[01:40.83]Singin' to the music playin' all night long
[01:43.26]Yeah I'm feeling right I'm living my life I do what I like
[01:47.06]'Cause I feel like a lady a lady
[01:52.81]Feel like a lady a lady yeah yeah
[02:09.14]Might change my hair and change my mind
[02:11.59]Might change your whole d**n life
[02:13.83]I may break your heart and not think twice
[02:16.48]That's right
[02:18.14]I'm a lady
[02:21.07]Sippin' on tequila with my Levi's on
[02:23.39]A lady
[02:26.08]Singin' to the music playin' all night long
[02:28.58]I'm feeling right I'm living my life I do what I like
[02:32.15]'Cause I feel like a lady a lady
[02:38.81]I feel like I feel like a lady
[02:43.86]I feel like I feel like a lady
[02:47.82]I feel like a lady
[02:48.99]I feel like I feel like a lady
[02:53.37]Like a lady
[02:54.10]I feel like
[02:56.81]Lady
data.trans:
[ti:Like A Lady]
[ar:Lady A]
[al:Women Of Big Machine]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:00.19]//
[00:00.39]//
[00:00.58]女士
[00:08.23]女士
[00:13.43]我不是那种会主动争取你注意的女孩
[00:19.99]//
[00:23.06]我并不害怕结束这一切看看我失去了什么
[00:29.93]//
[00:32.81]把裙子留在家里因为这让我太有礼貌了
[00:37.45]再也不要守在电话旁今晚我要出门
[00:41.73]因为我感觉自己是个淑女
[00:45.60]穿着李维斯喝着龙舌兰
[00:48.00]一位女士
[00:50.56]伴着彻夜播放的音乐歌唱
[00:52.93]我感觉很好我过着自己的生活我做自己喜欢的事
[00:56.84]因为我感觉自己是个淑女
[01:03.29]让自己享受人生中最美好的时光
[01:06.84]我想要的我都能得到
[01:10.16]//
[01:13.16]我可能看起来很孤单但我只珍惜每一分钟
[01:20.18]宝贝
[01:23.13]把高跟鞋留在家里因为它们从来都不好好待我
[01:27.59]一个人出去跳舞
[01:30.02]朋友这高跟鞋不会骗人
[01:32.21]因为我感觉自己是个淑女
[01:35.75]穿着李维斯喝着龙舌兰
[01:38.06]一位女士
[01:40.83]伴着彻夜播放的音乐歌唱
[01:43.26]我感觉很好我过着自己的生活我做自己喜欢的事
[01:47.06]因为我感觉自己是个淑女
[01:52.81]感觉自己是个淑女
[02:09.14]我可能会改变发型改变主意
[02:11.59]可能会改变你的整个人生
[02:13.83]我可能会让你肝肠寸断
[02:16.48]对啊
[02:18.14]我是个淑女
[02:21.07]穿着李维斯喝着龙舌兰
[02:23.39]一位女士
[02:26.08]伴着彻夜播放的音乐歌唱
[02:28.58]我感觉很好我过着自己的生活我做自己喜欢的事
[02:32.15]因为我感觉自己是个淑女
[02:38.81]我感觉自己是个淑女
[02:43.86]我感觉自己是个淑女
[02:47.82]我感觉自己是个淑女
[02:48.99]我感觉自己是个淑女
[02:53.37]就像淑女
[02:54.10]我感觉
[02:56.81]女士
